item.title: BIND: â€˜RRset exists (value dependent)â€™ prerequisite not satisfied (NXRRSET)
item.description: I was recently working on a server where a user on the server was concerned with these log messages: Oct 7 20:59:33 web named[13698]: client 111.222.333.444#50389: updating zone 'domain.com/IN': update failed: 'RRset exists (value dependent)' prerequisite not satisfied (NXRRSET) Oct 7 20:59:34 web named[13698]: client 111.222.333.444#50392: update 'domain.com/IN' denied Oct 7 21:59:35 web named[13698]: client 111.222.333.444#50422: updating zone 'domain.com/IN': update failed: 'RRset exists (value dependent)' prerequisite not satisfied (NXRRSET) Oct 7 21:59:35 web named[13698]: client 111.
